item.description:
Doug Hawkins (myself) will be presenting on the Java class file and byte code format, dynamic class generation, and Java 6's annotation processing tool.

The presentation will include example code demonstrating dynamically creating classes at runtime and creating classes at compile time using Java 6's annotation processing tool.

All source code and presentation materials will be available online after the presentation.

Doug Hawkins has been developing Java professionally for the past 7 years and currently works as a software engineer at Omgeo LLC, a Thomson Reuters DTCC company.

If you plan to attend, please RSVP by Friday June 4th.

Thanks, and I hope to see you there,
Doug
item.name: June Boston Java Meetup: Byte Code Generation and the Annotation Processing Tool
